acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased on 1997 November 5.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection contains the printer's setting copy of "The Old Town of Berwick," a history of Berwick in southern Maine. The manuscript contains the printer's penciled pagination, paragraph notations, and galley breaks; with many emendations and changes by Jewett.
There is also a published photograph of Jewett, n.d.

Printer's Setting Copy of The Old Town of Berwick, a history of Berwick, southern Maine, including tale and myth, by Sarah Orne Jewett, in ink, with printer's penciled pagination, paragraph notations, and galley breaks; with many emendations and changes by the author, before its publication in New England Magazine(New Series) 10, No. 5 (July 1895), pages 585-609

did.unittitle: Print of Sarah Orne Jewett from a published source, head and shoulders n.d.
